scripts.linkme:copy: pnpm run build && (printf 'javascript:'; cat dist/linkme.js) | pbcopy && echo 'Linkme bookmarklet copied to clipboard!'
scripts.joyous:copy: pnpm run build && (printf 'javascript:'; cat dist/joyous.js) | pbcopy && echo 'Joyous bookmarklet copied to clipboard!'
scripts.joyous:console: pnpm run build && cat dist/joyous.js | pbcopy && echo 'Joyous console script copied to clipboard! Paste into browser console.'
